About the Company Send with Confidence, Deliver with Speed Experience the power of QuickDel, India's most reliable and efficient courier service. With our extensive network and cutting-edge technology, we ensure your parcels reach their destination quickly and safely. View tariffs Our services Businesses Reliable and efficient shipping solutions for businesses of all sizes. E-commerce Seamless delivery services for online stores and e-commerce platforms. Students Affordable and secure courier options for students sending or receiving parcels. Healthcare Reliable and timely delivery of medical supplies and equipment. Individuals Convenient and secure courier services for personal parcels and gifts. Manufacturing Efficient shipping solutions for industrial goods and raw materials. Publishers Reliable and secure delivery of books, magazines, and printed materials. Artists Safe and timely shipping of artworks, paintings, and sculptures. Relocations Comprehensive moving and relocation services for households and offices. How does it work? Schedule a Pickup Book your pickup online or via our mobile app, and specify the pickup location and time. Doorstep Pickup Our professional courier will arrive at your doorstep to collect your parcel at the scheduled time. Secure Packaging Your parcel will be securely packaged and labeled with a unique tracking number. Real-Time Tracking Track your shipment's progress in real-time through our website or mobile app. Safe Delivery Your parcel will be delivered safely and on time to the specified destination address. About the Company QuickDel is a leading courier service provider in India, offering reliable and efficient shipping solutions to individuals, businesses, and organizations across the country. Founded in 2010, our company has grown to become a trusted name in the logistics industry, driven by our unwavering commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. With a vast network of delivery hubs and a dedicated team of professionals, we ensure that your parcels are handled with the utmost care and delivered promptly to their destinations. Our state-of-the-art tracking system enables you to monitor the journey of your shipments in real-time, providing you with complete transparency and peace of mind. At QuickDel, we pride ourselves on our innovative approach to courier services. We continuously invest in advanced technologies and streamlined processes to enhance our operational efficiency and provide our customers with a seamless experience. Our comprehensive range of services includes express delivery, international shipping, doorstep pickup, packaging solutions, and more, tailored to meet the diverse needs of our clients. We understand the importance of trust and reliability in the courier industry, which is why we prioritize the security and integrity of your shipments. Our team adheres to stringent quality control measures and follows industry best practices to ensure the safe handling and timely delivery of your parcels, every time. At QuickDel, we are committed to being a responsible corporate citizen, and we actively support sustainable practices and initiatives that positively impact our communities and the environment. Join us on our journey of delivering excellence and experience the convenience and reliability that QuickDel has to offer. View tariffs More 5,000 Delivery Locations QuickDel serves over 5,000 cities and towns across India, ensuring comprehensive nationwide coverage. More 1,000,000+ Parcels Delivered We have successfully delivered more than 1 million parcels to satisfied customers nationwide. More 99% On-Time Delivery Rate With our efficient logistics network, we maintain an impressive on-time delivery rate of 99%. pages.privacy: QuickDel - Your Partner for Fast and Reliable Deliveries in India | Privacy Policy Home Tariffs Services How does it work? About the Company Privacy Policy At QuickDel, we value the privacy and trust of our customers. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information you provide when using our courier services. Information We Collect When you place an order or create an account with us, we may collect personal information such as your name, address, contact details, and payment information. This information is necessary to process and deliver your shipments efficiently. Use of Information The personal information we collect is used solely for the purpose of providing our courier services to you. This includes processing your orders, communicating with you regarding shipment updates, and facilitating delivery. We may also use your information for administrative purposes, such as billing and customer support. Data Security We implement industry-standard security measures to protect the personal information you share with us. Our systems are designed to safeguard your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, please note that no method of data transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Third-Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. However, we may share your information with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in delivering our services, such as logistics partners or payment processors. These parties are required to maintain the confidentiality and security of your information. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our website and mobile applications may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and provide personalized services. These technologies help us understand how you interact with our platforms and allow us to improve our offerings. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information stored with us. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal data, please contact our customer support team. Updates to Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Any updates will be posted on our website, and we encourage you to review this policy periodically. By using our courier services, you acknowledge and consent to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Contact us at quickdel@gmail.com Address BHIKAJI CAMA PLACE 132A 1ST FLOOR, Somdutt Chamber 1, 132 A, above YES Bank, Rama Krishna Puram, New Delhi, Delhi 110066, India quickdel@gmail.com +919312948076 Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.tariffs: QuickDel - Your Partner for Fast and Reliable Deliveries in India | tariffs Home Tariffs Services How does it work? About the Company Tariffs Basic ₹99 Doorstep Pickup Tracking Updates Standard Packaging Express Delivery Insurance Coverage Choose Standard ₹199 Doorstep Pickup Tracking Updates Express Delivery Standard Packaging Insurance Coverage Choose Premium ₹299 Doorstep Pickup Tracking Updates Express Delivery Premium Packaging Insurance Coverage Choose Business ₹499 Doorstep Pickup Tracking Updates Express Delivery Premium Packaging Insurance Coverage Dedicated Support Choose International ₹799 Doorstep Pickup Tracking Updates Express Delivery Premium Packaging Insurance Coverage Customs Clearance Choose Enterprise Custom Quote Doorstep Pickup Tracking Updates Express Delivery Premium Packaging Insurance Coverage Dedicated Account Manager Customized Solutions Choose How to Place an Order? At QuickDel, we've made the process of placing an order for our courier services incredibly simple and convenient. Whether you're an individual or a business, you can easily book your shipment through our user-friendly online platform or our mobile app. To get started, simply visit our website or download the QuickDel app from your app store. Create an account by providing your basic details, and you'll be ready to place your order in just a few clicks. Once logged in, you can enter the pickup and delivery addresses, specify the package dimensions and weight, and select the desired service level based on your urgency and budget. Our intuitive interface will guide you through the process, providing real-time quotes and estimated delivery timelines. You can choose from a range of options, including express delivery, international shipping, doorstep pickup, and more. Additionally, you can opt for additional services like insurance coverage, premium packaging, or customized solutions for your specific needs. After reviewing and confirming your order details, you can proceed with the payment using your preferred method, such as credit/debit cards, net banking, or mobile wallets. Once the payment is processed successfully, you'll receive a confirmation with a unique tracking number, allowing you to monitor the progress of your shipment every step of the way. For businesses or frequent shippers, we offer convenient bulk booking options and integrated shipping solutions to streamline your logistics operations. Our dedicated support team is always available to assist you with any inquiries or special requirements you may have throughout the booking process. How Are Our Pricing Rates Determined? At QuickDel, we take pride in offering transparent and competitive pricing for our courier services. Our pricing structure is designed to provide value for money while ensuring efficient and reliable delivery solutions. The rates are determined based on several factors to ensure fairness and sustainability. One of the primary factors influencing our pricing is the distance between the pickup and delivery locations. Longer distances naturally incur higher transportation costs, which are reflected in the rates. Additionally, the size and weight of the package play a crucial role in determining the pricing, as larger and heavier items require more resources and handling during transit. Another key consideration is the service level you choose. Our express delivery services, which offer faster transit times, are priced slightly higher than our standard services to account for the additional logistical requirements and prioritized handling. Similarly, our international shipping rates are influenced by factors such as customs clearance, documentation, and transportation across borders. We also factor in additional services like insurance coverage, premium packaging, and specialized handling requirements when determining the final pricing. These value-added services ensure the safety and secure delivery of your parcels, justifying the slight premium in pricing. At QuickDel, we continuously strive to optimize our operations and leverage economies of scale to keep our pricing competitive. Our vast network and efficient logistics systems enable us to offer cost-effective solutions without compromising on quality or reliability. Rest assured, our pricing is transparent, and you'll always know the exact cost upfront before booking your shipment. pages.terms: QuickDel - Your Partner for Fast and Reliable Deliveries in India | Terms and Conditions Home Tariffs Services How does it work? About the Company Terms and Conditions Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the services of QuickDel courier service. By utilizing our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Service Description QuickDel provides domestic and international courier services for the transportation and delivery of parcels and documents. Our services are subject to the rates, rules, and regulations in effect at the time of shipment. Prohibited Items QuickDel reserves the right to refuse or suspend shipments containing prohibited or restricted items, such as hazardous materials, illegal substances, or items that may cause harm or damage to our personnel or facilities. Packaging and Labeling It is the customer's responsibility to ensure that all parcels are properly packaged and labeled for safe transportation. QuickDel is not liable for damage or loss due to improper packaging or labeling. Delivery and Delays QuickDel will make reasonable efforts to deliver your shipments within the estimated delivery times. However, we cannot guarantee delivery dates or times due to unforeseen circumstances beyond our control, such as weather conditions, customs clearance delays, or other force majeure events. Liability and Insurance QuickDel's liability for loss or damage to shipments is limited to the declared value of the shipment or the actual documented loss, whichever is lower. We strongly recommend purchasing additional insurance coverage for valuable or fragile items. Claims Any claims for loss or damage must be reported to QuickDel within 7 days of the scheduled delivery date. Failure to file a claim within this timeframe may result in the claim being denied. Payment and Charges All charges are payable in advance, unless otherwise agreed upon. QuickDel reserves the right to modify its rates and charges at any time without prior notice. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from the use of QuickDel's services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts. By using QuickDel's services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions. QuickDel reserves the right to modify or update these terms at any time, and it is your responsibility to review them periodically. Contact us at quickdel@gmail.com Address BHIKAJI CAMA PLACE 132A 1ST FLOOR, Somdutt Chamber 1, 132 A, above YES Bank, Rama Krishna Puram, New Delhi, Delhi 110066, India quickdel@gmail.com +919312948076 Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
